info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:34AM EST until January 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow and sleet accumulations of up to 2 inches and ice accumulations of a glaze to few hundredths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern Connecticut and central, eastern and western Massachusetts. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on icy road conditions into the morning commute. Even as air temperatures rise above freezing, ground temperatures will be slow to rise above freezing until after daybreak due to the recent stretch of cold weather.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
